/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is flanked by towering buildings and lush green trees, creating a harmonious blend of urban architecture and natural elements. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with a few clouds, adding to the overall serene ambiance of the scene. The image is taken from a low angle, which enhances the grandeur of the buildings and the vastness of the sky. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky and the gray of the buildings.
